imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Cropped square headshot photo centered on the face with neutral/softened background (founder-dilkhush.dim_512x512.jpg)
- Small square headshot crop centered on the face (founder-dilkhush.dim_128x128.jpg)

existing_features.title: Add the uploaded Founder Dilkhush photo as a static asset and use it anywhere the app currently shows the default owner photo, ensuring it renders correctly across header, About, and the Owner/Meet-the-Owners section.
Update the OwnerPhoto component default imageSrc so that if no imageSrc prop is passed, it uses the new Founder Dilkhush static asset instead of /assets/IMG-20260207-WA0000.jpg.
Render the generated founder photo asset from frontend/public/assets/ in the app (do not route image serving through the backend canister).

new_feature_requests.summary: Add/display a photo of Founder Dilkhush on the site/app

projectName: Add Founder Dilkhush photo to the site
